name: Anemone
description:
Want me to create custom models for you? please visit my Fiverr page:

https://www.fiverr.com/s/Xar15P

It's not necessary but If you like my creations please consider to support me to create more projects by donate in here:

https://ko-fi.com/gorillamonsooniii

https://www.patreon.com/GorillaMonsoon

Anemone

anemone is one of my first trained model, at first I wasn't satisfied with the results I got, then some time ago I watched some old anime and movies (especially Kill Bill movie LOL), and then an idea occurred to me to retrain, by adding some images in the existing dataset.
Dataset has been preprocessed using Aspect Ratio Bucketing Tool so that it can be converted to latents and trained at non-square resolutions.

Legal & Risk

In principle, I do not support the use of this model to generate any adult content. When using this model, users must abide by laws and regulations, and do not infringe other people's reputation, privacy or portrait rights.

Changelogs

  • v1.0-fp16: added fp16 (no EMA) model

Who find this model perfect

  • LoRA/LoCon/LyCORIS user who are looking for a compatible checkpoint

  • Creative prompters

Usage

  • Almost compatible with all sampling methods available, but Euler a and DPM++ SDE Karras are my recommendation

  • Use at least 20 sampling steps, more than 40 is not giving any improvement

  • CFG: 4.5-7

  • Less complicated, short negative prompts are better

  • Preffered VAE

If using Hires:

  • Hires step: 10-20 steps

  • R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6b, if you're prefer Latent upscaler, use Latent (nearest-exact)

After download this model, try to share with us about your findings.

Please give star reviews with your generated picture if you like it.

I'm also accept commisioning for LoRA/Checkpoint
